r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - PHP8 Supported - Fixed issue #508 (Route::addConfig take action as module wrongly) - Fixed issue #509 (getViewpath return NULL) - Fixed issue #513 (supports of custom camel MVC name) - Fixed issue #518 (setRediect not working)
